title: Native test fails if configure different final name property

labels.name: triage/wontfix
labels.description: This will not be worked on

body:
### Describe the bug

In case of using quarkus.package.output-name or quarkus.package.runner-suffix property the native test will fail.

### Expected behavior

Tests executed and passed

### Actual behavior

error=2, No such file or directory Caused by: java.io.IOException: Cannot run program

### How to Reproduce?

Just configure the properties  quarkus.package.output-name or quarkus.package.runner-suffix in application.properties or via -D param to run the test.

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

MacOs Darwin 21.4.0 arm64

### Output of `java -version`

OpenJDK Runtime Environment GraalVM CE 22.1.0 (build 11.0.15+10-jvmci-22.1-b06)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

OpenJDK Runtime Environment GraalVM CE 22.1.0 (build 11.0.15+10-jvmci-22.1-b06)

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.8.3.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Apache Maven 3.8.4

### Additional information

_No response_
